00010 #include "Jamoma.h"

00012 
00013 // Data Structure for this object
00014 typedef struct _phasor{
00015         t_pxobject      obj;
00016         void            *obex;
00017         double          attr_period;
00018         double          frequency;
00019         double          one_over_sr;
00020         double          lastoutput;
00021 } t_phasor;
00022 
00023 
00024 // Prototypes for methods
00025 void*           phasor_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00026 void            phasor_free(t_phasor *x);
00027 t_int*          phasor_perform(t_int *w);
00028 void            phasor_dsp(t_phasor *x, t_signal **sp, short *count);
00029 t_max_err       phasor_attr_setperiod(t_phasor *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00030 
00031 
00032 // Globals
00033 static t_class* phasor_class;
00034 
00035 
00036 /************************************************************************************/
00037 // Main() Function
00038 
00039 int main(void)                          // main recieves a copy of the Max function macros table
00040 {
00041         t_class *c;
00042         
00043         jamoma_init();
00044 
00045         // Define our class
00046         c = class_new("jcom.phasor~", (method)phasor_new, (method)phasor_free, 
00047                 sizeof(t_phasor), (method)NULL, A_GIMME, 0);
00048 
00049         class_obexoffset_set(c, calcoffset(t_phasor, obex));
00050 
00051         // Make methods accessible for our class: 
00052         class_addmethod(c, (method)phasor_dsp,                          "dsp",          A_CANT, 0L);
00053     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_dumpout,     "dumpout",      A_CANT,0);  
00054 
00055         // Add attributes to our class:
00056         class_addattr(c, 
00057                 attr_offset_new("interval", _sym_float64, 0,
00058                 (method)0, (method)phasor_attr_setperiod, calcoffset(t_phasor, attr_period))
00059         );      
00060         
00061         // Setup our class to work with MSP
00062         class_dspinit(c);
00063 
00064         // Finalize our class
00065         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00066         phasor_class = c;
00067         return 0;
00068 }
00069 
00070 
00071 /************************************************************************************/
00072 // Object Life
00073 
00074 // Create
00075 void *phasor_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00076 {
00077         long    attrstart = attr_args_offset(argc, argv);
00078         
00079         t_phasor *x = (t_phasor *)object_alloc(phasor_class);
00080         if(x){
00081                 object_obex_store((void *)x, _sym_dumpout, (t_object*)outlet_new(x, NULL));
00082 
00083                 x->one_over_sr = 1.0 / DEFAULT_SAMPLE_RATE;
00084                 x->lastoutput = 0.0;
00085                 if(attrstart && argv)
00086                         x->attr_period = atom_getlong(argv);
00087                 else
00088                         x->attr_period = 1000.0;
00089 
00090                 dsp_setup((t_pxobject *)x, 1);                  // Create Object and Inlets
00091                 outlet_new((t_pxobject *)x, "signal");  // Create a signal Outlet
00092 
00093                 attr_args_process(x, argc, argv);                       
00094         }
00095         return x;
00096 }
00097 
00098 // Destroy
00099 void phasor_free(t_phasor *x)
00100 {       
00101         dsp_free((t_pxobject *)x);                                      // Always call dsp_free first in this routine
00102 }
00103 
00104 /************************************************************************************/
00105 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00106 
00107 
00108 // Perform Method
00109 t_int *phasor_perform(t_int *w)
00110 {
00111         t_phasor        *x = (t_phasor *)(w[1]);
00112         t_float         *out = (t_float *)(w[2]);
00113         int                     n = (int)(w[3]);
00114         double          phase, 
00115                                 slope, 
00116                                 prev = x->lastoutput;
00117 
00118         if(x->obj.z_disabled)
00119                 goto exit;
00120         
00121         jamoma_scheduler_getphase(x->attr_period, &phase, &slope);
00122 
00123         while(n--){
00124                 if(phase > 1.0)
00125                         prev = phase = phase - 1.0;
00126                 if(phase < prev)
00127                         phase = prev;
00128                 *out++ = prev = phase;
00129                 phase += slope;
00130         }
00131         x->lastoutput = phase;
00132         
00133 exit:
00134         return (w+4);
00135 }
00136 
00137 
00138 // DSP Method
00139 void phasor_dsp(t_phasor *x, t_signal **sp, short *count)
00140 {
00141         jamoma_dsp(NULL, sp, count);
00142 
00143         x->one_over_sr = 1.0 / (double)sp[0]->s_sr;
00144         dsp_add(phasor_perform, 3, x, sp[1]->s_vec, sp[1]->s_n);
00145 }
00146 
00147 
00148 t_max_err phasor_attr_setperiod(t_phasor *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00149 {
00150         x->attr_period = atom_getfloat(argv);
00151         x->frequency = DEFAULT_TICKS_PER_SECOND / x->attr_period;
00152         
00153         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00154 }
